remarks: Atom exchange property.  Version of ~ hlatexch2 with covers relation. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
atexchcvr.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atexchcvr.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atexchcvr.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
atexchcvrN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ P =/= R ) -> ( P C ( Q .\/ R ) -> Q C ( P .\/ R ) ) ) $.
